name: Grey Wind
text: No attachments. Deadly. Dominance:kneel 2 influence to search your deck for Robb Stark and put him into play. Then, you may attach Grey Wind to Robb Stark (counts as a Retainer attachment with deathbound and the text "Attached character gains +3 STR") Then shuffle your deck. [doomed]

name: Lady
text: No attachments. Deadly. Dominance: kneel 2 influence to search your deck for Sansa Stark and put her into play. Then, you may attach Lady to Sansa Stark (counts as a Retainer attachment with deathbound and the text "Response: after you win a challenge in which attached character participated, draw a card.") Then shuffle your deck. [doomed]

name: Nymeria
text: No attachments. Deadly. Dominance: kneel 2 influence to search your deck for Arya Stark and put her into play. Then, you may attach Nymeria to Arya Stark (counts as a Retainer attachment with deathbound and the text "Attached character gains a [military] icon.") Then shuffle your deck. [doomed]

name: Summer
text: No attachments. Deadly. Dominance: kneel 2 influence to search your deck for Bran Stark and put him into play. Then, you may attach Summer to Bran Stark (counts as a Retainer attachment with deathbound and the text "Lower the influence cost to trigger attached character's ability by 1.") Then shuffle your deck. [doomed]

name: ∞ Trident Reinforcements
text: Dominance: return Trident Reinforcements from you dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.
flavor: "The red stallion was always a welcome sight in Riverrun." -Catelyn Stark

name: Aemon's Correspondent
text: Lower the cost to play Aemon's Correspondent to 0 if there is at least 1 Night's Watch character in play.
flavor: "I felt not heat. Did you, Sam?" -Maester Aemon

name: Edmure's Van
text: Challenges: kill Edmure's Van (cannot be saved) to choose and kill an attacking character.
flavor: "This is Tully land." Edmure declared. "If Tywin Lannister thinks to cross it unbloodied, I mean to teach him a hard lesson."

name: Grim Defender
text:
X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile.
+X influence
[doomed]

name: Sullen Recruit
text: While there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play, Sullen Recruit cannot be discarded from play.
flavor: "The Watch is not what it was. Too few honest men to keep the rogues in line." -Donal Noye

name: Icy Moat
text: Attacking characters without a [military] icon get -1 STR.
flavor: Path, steps, and door were in a straight line, which made you think the causeway ran straight, but that wasn't so. Under the lake it zigged and zagged, going a third of the way around the island before jagging back.

name: Mole Town Brothel
text: Discard Mole Town Brothel from play at any time there are more Wildling characters than Night's Watch characters in play. Any phase: kneel 1 influence to choose and stand a defending character.

name: Reinforced Walls
text: Response: kneel Reinforced Walls and kneel 2 influence to save a location from being discarded from play.
flavor:
Winterfell was encircled by two massive granite walls, with a wide moat between them.
The outer wall stood eighty feet tall, the inner more than a hundred.

name: Gold for Bribes
text: Any phase: until the end of the phase, attached character gains a trait of your choice (limit once per round).
flavor: "Bribes might sway some of the lesser lords." -Lord Tywin Lannister

name: In Love with Cersei
text: Attached character gets -2 STR and loses an [intrigue] icon.
flavor: "Love's not always wise, I've learned." -Lord Robb Stark

name: Podrick Payne
text: Challenges: during a [military] or [power] challenge, choose an attacking character to get +1 STR. If that character is Tyrion Lannister, he gains an additional +1 STR and deadly. (Limit once per phase.) [doomed]

name: Ser Jacelyn Bywater
text: Immune to character abilities. Response: after Ser Jacelyn Bywater is killed, each opponent must choose and discard a card at random from his or her hand, if able.

name: ∞ Frey Outrider
text: Opponents cannot play attachments on Frey Outrider. Dominance: return Frey Outrider from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.

name: Cersei's Attendant
text: Response: after Cersei Lannister or Cersei's Attendant is killed, choose and kneel a character.
flavor: Serving men cleared away the swan, hardly touched. Cersei beckoned for the sweet.

name: Exiled Asshai Courtesan
text: Response: after you play Exiled Asshai Courtesan from your hand, choose and kneel X characters. X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile. [doomed]

name: Kingsroad Merchant Master
text: While there is at least 1 Night's Watch character in play, Kingsroad Merchant Master gets +2 STR and gains "Response: after you win a challenge in which Kingsroad Merchant Master participated, draw a card."

name: Sacrificial Envoy
text: Challenges: kill Sacrificial Envoy (cannot be saved) to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be declared as an attacker or defender.

name: Slynt's Man
text: While there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play, Slynt's Man gains "Any phase: kneel Slynt's Man to draw a card."

name: Lannisport Archives
text: Response: after you win an [intrigue] challenge, claim 1 power for your House (limit once per phase).
flavor: "Lannisport was the end of our voyage." -Prince Oberyn Martell

name: Undefended Port
text: Discard Undefended Port from play at any time there are more Wildling characters than Night's Watch characters in play. Any phase: kneel Undefended Port to draw 2 cards.

name: Devan Seaworth
text: While any character you control has 1 or more power, Devan Seaworth gains stealth.
flavor: The boy wore a cream-colored doublet with a fiery heart sewn on the breast.

name: Edric Storm
text:
Stealth.
During [power] challenges, characters attacking you lose stealth and renown.
flavor:
Robert was a different man than Stannis, sure enough. The boy is like him. Aye, and like Renly as well.
[doomed]

name: ∞ The Lord's Assassin
text: Stealth. Dominance: return The Lord's Assassin from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.

name: Blackwater Captain
text: Response: after you play Blackwater Captain from your hand, kneel X influence to have it claim X power. X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile. [doomed]

name: Guardsman of the Arbor
text: Dominance: kill Guardsman of the Arbor (cannot be saved) to move 2 power from any House to a character.

name: Robert's Squire
text: Response: after Robert Baratheon or Robert's Squire is killed, shuffle your discard pile. Then, return on of those cards at random to your hand.

name: Stannis's Cavalry
text: No attachments. Deadly. While there is at least 1 Night's Watch character in play. Stannis's Cavalry gains renown.
flavor: And yellow, so much yellow, yellow banners with a red device, whose arms were those?

name: Stannis's Personal Guard
text: While there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play, Stannis's Personal Guard gets +2 STR.
flavor: King's men, not queen's men. But it would not do to boast of them.

name: Caverns of Storm's End
text: Response: kneel Caverns of Storm's End and 1 influence to save a character with at least 1 power from being killed. Then, discard all power from that character.

name: Crackclaw Point Tower
text: Discard Crackclaw Point Tower from play at any time there are more Wildling characters in play than Night's Watch characters. +1 initiative

name: Melisandre's Garden
text: Challenges: kneel Melisandre's Garden to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot attack or defend during [power] challenges.

name: Salladhor's Merchant Vessel
text: Challenges: kneel Salladhor's Merchant Vessel to choose and stand a character with a [power] icon.
flavor: But no, her hull was striped. She was Lysene, she was Salladhor Saan's.

name: Gevin Harlaw
text: Immune to events. Response: after a location is discarded from play, kneel 1 influence to have Gevin Harlaw or Theon Greyjoy claim 1 power. [doomed]

name: Stygg
text: Stygg gets +1 STR for each Warship location you control.
flavor: Tallhart, you've spit away your life. Theon though. "Stygg, silence him." he said.

name: ∞ Sea God's Disciple
text: Dominance: return Sea God's Disciple from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.

name: Balon's Retainer
text: Response: after Balon Greyjoy or Balon's Retainer is killed, choose a [greyjoy] character to gain stealth and renown until the end of the phase.

name: Bay of Ice Buccaneers
text: No attachments. Deadly. While there is at least 1 Night's Watch character in play, Bay of Ice Buccaneers gains renown.

name: Cotter Pyke's Men
text: No attachments. Deadly. While there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play, Cotter Pyke's Men gains "Response: kneel 1 influence to save Cotter Pyke's Men from being killed. Then, Cotter Pyke's Men claim 1 power.

name: Euron's Servant
text: Dominance: kneel Euron's Servant to choose and discard from play a non-Limited location with cost X or lower. X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile. [doomed]

name: Seagard Looter
text: Any phase: kill Seagard Looter (cannot be saved) to choose and kneel up to 3 locations.
flavor: Seagard had been built to defend the coast against reavers from the Iron Islands, the Greyjoy of Pyke chief among them.

name: Damphair's Chambers
text: Challenges: kneel Damphair's Chambers to choose an attacking character. Until the end of the phase that character gains deadly.

name: Fjords of Ironman's Bay
text: Discard Fjords of Ironman's Bay from play at any time there are more Wildling characters than Night's Watch characters in play. Characters you control get +1 STR.

name: Goodbrother Interceptor
text: Response: kneel Goodbrother Interceptor to save a Warship location from being discarded. Then, stand that location.
flavor: Some of the sails bore the devices from other islands; the blood moon of Wych, Lord Goodbrother's banded black warhorn, Harlaw's silver scythe.

name: Pyke Drydocks
text: Any phase: kneel to choose a Warship location. Until the end of the phase, that location is immune to events.
flavor: Dreary, dark, forbidding, Pyke stood atop those islands and pillars, almost a part of them.

name: Festering Wound
text:
Attached character gets -3 STR.
Attached character is killed if its STR is 0.
flavor: The wound he had taken on his hip the night he fought Khal Drogo's bloodriders had never fully healed.

name: Horse Whip
text:
While attached character has exactly 1 attachment, it gains stealth.
While attached character has more than 1 attachment, it gets +2 STR and gains stealth and deadly.

name: Ser Jorah's Storybooks
text: Discard Ser Jorah's Storybooks from play at any time there are more Wildling characters than Night's Watch characters in play. Any phase: kneel attached character to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character is immune to opponents' events and character abilities.

name: Brown Ben Plumm
flavor:
"Well," said Brown Ben, "there was some old Plumm in the Sunset Kingdoms who wed a dragon princess. My grandmama told me the tale. He lived in King Aegon's day."
"Which King Aegon?" Dany asked. "Five Aegons have ruled in Westeros."

name: Haggo
text: Response: after a [targaryen] character is killed, stand Haggo.
flavor: It had grown so silent in the hall that she could hear the bells in Khal Drogo's hair, chiming softly with each step he took. His bloodriders followed him, like three copper shadows.

name: Qotho
text:
Immune to events.
Qotho gets -3 STR while you control Daenerys Targaryen.
flavor: "The Dothraki say a man and his bloodriders share one life, and Qotho sees it ending. A dead man is beyond fear."

name: ∞ Blue-Lipped Warlock
text: Blue-Lipped Warlock does not kneel to attack. Dominance: return Blue-Lipped Warlock from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.

name: Bloodthirsty Khal
text: Stealth.
flavor: Challenges: kneel 1 influence to give Bloodthirsty Khal +X STR until the end of the phase. X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile. [doomed]

name: Dany's Handmaiden
text: Response: after Daenerys Targaryen or Dany's Handmaiden is killed, choose and discard an attachment from play.
flavor: The girl brushed her hair until it shone like molten silver, while the old woman annointed her with spiceflower perfume of the Dothraki plains.

name: Minor Khalasar
text: No attachments. Deadly. Challenges: kill Minor Khalasar (cannot be saved) to choose a defending character without attachments. Until the end of the phase, that character gets -4 STR and is killed if its STR is 0.

name: Narrow Sea Trader
text: While there is at least 1 Night's Watch character in play, Narrow Sea Trader gains "Response: after you play Narrow Sea Trader from your hand, choose and discard an attachment from play."

name: Westerosi Informant
text: While there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play, Westerosi Informant gains "Marshalling: kneel to lower the cost of the next [targaryen] attachment you play this phase by 2."

name: Delicate Stomach
text: Response: after you lose a challenge, kneel attached character. Discard all other attachments and power from attached character.
flavor: "Pray tell me, when will justice be served?" -Prince Oberyn Martell

name: Hooked Spear
text: While attached character is participating in a challenge, it gains "Challenges: kneel 1 influence to choose and discard from play a Weapon or Item attachment on a participating character."

name: Vainglorious
text: Attached character gets -1 STR for each icon it has.
flavor: "The Fat Flower thrust him into the tourney at too tender an age, just as he did with the other two. He wanted another Leo Longhorn, and made himself a cripple."

name: Darkstar
text: While Darkstar is attacking or defending alone, he gets +1 STR, gains deadly and gains "Response: after a character is killed, draw 2 cards."

name: Nymeria Sand
text: Response: kneel 1 influence to cancel a triggered effect that chooses a Sand Snake character as a target. Then, stand Nymeria Sand. [doomed]

name: ∞ Son of the Red Viper
text: Stealth. Deadly. Dominance: return Son of the Red Viper from your dead pile to your hand. Use this ability only if there are at least 3 characters in your dead pile.

name: Doran's Honor Guard
text: No attachments. Deadly. While there is at least 1 Night's Watch character in play, Doran's Honor Guard gains "Response: after you play Doran's Honor Guard from your hand, draw 2 cards."

name: Far-Seeing Scholar
text: While there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play, Far-Seeing Scholar gains deadly.
flavor: He had studied at the Citadel, going so far as to forge six links of a maester's chain before he grew bored.

name: House Dayne Skirmisher
text: No attachments. Any phase: kill House Dayne Skirmisher (cannot be saved) to draw a card. Then, each opponent chooses and discards a card from his or her hand.

name: Oberyn's Lover
text: Response: after The Red Viper or Oberyn's Lover is killed, choose a [martell] character to gain stealth, a [military] and an [intrigue] icon until the end of the phase.

name: Prince's Loyalist
text: Stealth. Immune to events. Response: kneel 1 influence to cancel a triggered character ability with influence cost X or lower. X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile. [doomed]

name: Remote Oasis
text: Discard Remote Oasis from play at any time there are more Wildling characters than Night's Watch characters in play. Response: after a player wins a challenge against you, he or she must choose and discard a card from his or her hand.

name: First Ranger
text: Deathbound. After you play First Ranger from your hand, discard from play all other copies of attached character. All copies of attached character you own or control are considered unique, gain the Night's Watch trait, and cannot be killed.

name: Longclaw
text: Night's Watch character only. While attached character is attacking, raise the Claim value on your revealed plot card by 1 for each Others plot card revealed.

name: Lord of Harrenhal
text: Deathbound. After you play Lord of Harrenhal from your hand, discard from play all other copies of attached character. All copies of attached character you own or control are considered unique, gain the Lord trait, and gets +4 STR.

name: War Band Leader
text: Deathbound. After you play War Band Leader from your hand, discard from play all other copies of attached character. All copies of attached character you own or control are considered unique, gain the Wildling trait, deadly, stealth, renown and are immune to events.

name: ∞ Black Raven
text: Deathbound. Any phase: kneel 2 influence to give attached character the Night's Watch or Wildling trait until the end of the phase. Dominance: kneel 3 influence to return Black Raven from your dead pile to your hand.

name: ∞ Court Counsel
text: Deathbound. Attached character gains an [intrigue] and a [power] icon. Dominance: return Court Counsel from your dead pile to your hand.

name: ∞ War Counsel
text: Deathbound. Attached character gets +2 STR and gains a [military] icon. Dominance: return War Counsel from your dead pile to your hand.

name: Bone Axe
text: Wildling character only. While attached character is attacking Bone Axe gains "Challenges: kneel Bone Axe to choose and kill another participating character with STR 2 or lower."

name: Alfyn Crowkiller
text: Any phase: choose and discard a Wildling character from play (cannot be saved) to choose and kill a Night's Watch character with STR 2 or lower.

name: Craster
text: You may pay a +2 gold penalty while playing Craster from your hand (cannot be ignored). Response: after you play Craster with a gold penalty, kneel all Night's Watch characters. [doomed]

name: Dalla
text: Mance Rayder cannot be killed.
flavor: "We free folk know things you kneelers have forgotten. Sometimes the short road is not the safest Jon Snow. The Horned Lord once said sorcery is a sword without a hilt. Ther is no safe way to grasp it."

name: Donal Noye
text: No attachments. Response save a The North location from being discarded (limit once per phase).
flavor: Donal Noye did not return, nor any of them who went down with him to hold that cold black tunnel.

name: Grenn
text: No attachments. You may pay a +1 gold penalty while playing Grenn from your hand (cannot be ignored). Response: after you play Grenn with a gold penalty, choose a Wildling character. Return that character to its owner's hand.

name: Harma Dogshead
text: While there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play, lower the printed cost to play Harma Dogshead to 0.

name: Jarmen Buckwell
text: No attachments. Challenges: choose a Night's Watch character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth (limit once per phase). [doomed]

name: Maester Aemon
text: No attachments. Response: after you win a challenge in which at least 1 Night's Watch character particpated, draw a card.

name: Ryk "Longspear"
text: Deadly. Renown. While Ryk Longspear is attacking or defending, Night's Watch characters get -1 STR. [doomed]
flavor: Jons's sword hand opened and closed, flexing his burned fingers beneath his glove, but Longspear Ryk only laughed.

name: Samwell Taryl
text: No attachments. Any phase: kneel Samwell Tarly to look at the top 4 cards of your deck. Switch any one of those cards with a card in your hand, if able. Then, put the remaining cards on top of your deck in any order.

name: Thoren Smallwood
text: Dominance: kneel Thoren Smallwood and 2 influence to choose and discard from play a Creature or Wildling character. [doomed]

name: Tormund Giantsbane
text: No attachments. Any phase: kneel 1 influence to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character loses deadly and Tormund Giantsbane gains deadly. [doomed]

name: Blackmailing Servant
text: Challenges: kneel Blackmailing Servant to choose and kneel a character with 2 or more attachments.

name: Bringer of Ill Tidings
text: Response: after you play Bringer of Ill Tidings from your hand, each player may put into play a Night's Watch or Messenger character from his or her hand.

name: Harbinger of Woes
text: Response: after you play Harbinger of Woes from your hand, choose 1 Wildling or Messenger character controlled by each player, if able. Each of those characters claims 1 power.

name: Ranger Scout
text: No attachments. Any phase: kill Ranger Scout (cannot be saved) to choose a Night's Watch character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +2 STR and gains deadly.

name: The Stranger's Septon
text: Any phase: kneel the Stranger's Septon to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gets +X STR, where X is the number of cards in your dead pile.

name: Vanguard Herald
text: Response: after you play Vanguard Herald from your hand, each player may return a character he or she owns to its owner's hand.

name: Wandering Crow
text: No attachments. Response: after Wandering Crow is killed, put the top card of your deck into play, face down, as a character named "Recruit." It has the Night's Watch trait, 1 STR, a [military] icon, and the no attachments keyword.

name: Wildling Rabble
text: No attachments. Deadly. Response after Wildling Rabble is killed, put the top card of your deck into play, face down, as a character named "Free Folk." It has the Wildling trait, 2 STR, and a [military] and a [power] icon. At the end of the phase, discard all cards named Free Folk from play (cannot be saved).

name: Young Spearwife
text: Marshalling: kill Young Spearwife (cannot be saved) to lower the cost of the next Wildling character you play this phase by 2.
flavor: "A man can own a woman or a man can own a knife." -Ygritte

name: Craster's Keep
text: Deathbound. Any phase: kneel Craster's Keep to put the top card of your deck into play, face down, as a character named "Free Folk." It has the Wildling trait, 2 STR, and a [military] and a [power] icon. At the end of the phase, discard all cards named Free Folk from play (cannot be saved). [doomed]

name: Westwatch by-the-Bridge
text: Deathbound. Any phase: kneel Westwatch by-the-Bridge to put the top card of your deck into play, face down, as a character named "Recruit." It has the Night's Watch trait, 1 STR, a [military] icon and the no attachments keyword. [doomed]

name: Bay of Ice
text: Any phase: kneel Bay of Ice and kneel 1 influence to choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character cannot be killed.

name: Camps on the Milkwater
text: Limited. Marshalling: kneel Camps on the Milkwater to lower the cost of the next Wildling character you play this phase by 1.

name: Greywater Swamp
text: Marshalling: kneel Greywater Swamp to raise the cost of the next character played this phase by 1. This is considered to be a gold penalty.

name: Oxcross
text: After a player loses an unopposed challenge, he or she must discard the top 4 cards of his or her deck.
flavor: "Your brother fell upon my uncle Stafford, encamped with his host at a village called Oxcross not three days ride from Casterly Rock." -Lord Tyrion Lannister

name: Stronghold on the Wall
text: Limited. Marshalling: kneel Stronghold on the Wall to lower the cost of the next Night's Watch character you play this phase by 1.

name: The Frozen Shore
text: Any phase: kneel The Frozen Shore to choose a location with printed cost 3 or higher. Until the end of the phase, that location is immune to events and character abilities.

name: ∞ My Life for Conquest
text: House Greyjoy only. Deathbound. Response: after you win an unopposed challenge, claim 2 power for your House. Marshalling: kill a [greyjoy] character you control (cannot be saved) to return My Life for Conquest from your dead pile to your hand.

name: ∞ My Life for Honor
text: House Stark only. Deathbound. Dominance: kneel 3 influence to choose and kill a non-[stark] character. Marshalling: kill a [stark] character you control (cannot be saved) to return My Life for Honor from your dead pile to your hand.

name: ∞ My Life for Justice
text: House Targaryen only. Deathbound. Any phase: choose a character. Until the end of the phase, treat that character as though it had 0 attachments. Marshalling: kill a [targaryen] character you control (cannot be saved) to return My Life for Justice from your dead pile to your hand.

name: ∞ My Life for Love
text: House Lannister only. Deathbound. Marshalling: lower the cost of the next income-producing card you play this phase by 3. Marshalling: kill a [lannister] character you control (cannot be saved) to return My Life for Love from your dead pile to your hand.

name: ∞ My Life for the Lord
text: House Baratheon only. Deathbound. Response: after a character claims power for renwon, discard 2 power from any character or House card. Marshalling: kill a [baratheon] character you control (cannot be saved) to return My Life for the Lord from your dead pile to your hand.

name: ∞ My Life for Vengeance
text: House Martell only. Deathbound. Challenges: name an icon and choose 2 characters. Until the end of the phase, one of those characters loses the named icon, and the other gains it. Marshalling: kill a [martell] character you control (cannot be saved) to return My Life for Vengeance from your dead pile to your hand.

name: As Sunlight Fades
text: Response: after a doomed character you control is killed, each opponent must choose and discard from play a location he or she controls, if able.
flavor: "They grow stronger as the days grow shorter and the nights colder." -Mance Rayder

name: Cracks in the Wall
text: Response: after you play a Wildling character, choose and kneel a location. Then, if there are more Wildling characters than Night's Watch characters in play, discard that location from play.
flavor: "This wall is made o' blood." -Ygritte

name: Crumbled to Dust
text: Any phase: kneel 1 influence to give all locations deathbound until the end of the phase.
flavor: "If I sound the Horn of Winter, the Wall will fall. Or so the songs would have me believe." -Mance Rayder

name: Grisly Resurrection
text: Deathbound. Dominance: put into play a doomed character from your dead pile. [doomed]
flavor: Her cloak and collar hid the gash his brother's blade had made, but her face was worse than he remembered.

name: Hope Fades with Twilight
text: Deathbound. Any phase: kneel 2 influence to give all non-Wildling characters -1 STR until the end of the phase. Then, all Wildling characters get +1 STR and are immune to character abilities. [doomed]

name: I Am a Bloodthirsty Man
text: Challenges: until the end of the phase, each [martell] character with stealth gets +1 STR. Then, if The Red Viper is in your dead pile, put him into play.

name: Kill the Crows!
text: Any phase: kneel 4 influence to put the top 3 cards of your deck into play, face down, each as a character with the name "Free Folk." They have the Wildling trait, 2 STR, and a [military] and [power] icon. At the end of the phase, discard all cards named Free Folk from play (cannot be saved).

name: King Balon's Command
text: House Greyjoy only. Marshalling: kneel your House card to put into play a location from your hand or discard pile.
flavor: Theon entered, but Lord Balon waved him silent. "I have made my plans, it is time you head them."

name: King Robert's Command
text: House Baratheon only. Dominance: kneel your House card to choose a character. That character claims 2 power.
flavor: "Put on the badge, Ned. It suits you. And if you ever throw it in my face again I swear to you, I'll pin the damned thing on Jaime Lannister." -King Robert Baratheon

name: Last Battle at the Wall
text: Any phase: kneel 4 influence to discard from play all Night's Watch and Wildling characters.
flavor: "But once the Wall is fallen," Dalla said, "What will stop the Others?"

name: Lord Eddard's Command
text: House Stark only.
flavor: Challenges: kneel your House card to initiate an additional challenge of your choice this phase (limit once per round).

name: Massing at Twilight
text: Deathbound. Draw: kneel your House card to reveal the top 3 cards of your deck and put them into your hand. [doomed]
flavor: The west had gone the color of a blood bruise, but the sky above was cobalt blue, deepening to purple, and the stars were coming out.

name: Prince Doran's Command
text: House Martell only. Challenges: kneel your House card to choose an attacking character. Remove that character from the challenge.

name: Queen Cersei's Command
text: House Lannister only. Any phase: kneel your House card to choose and kneel a character. Discard all attachments and power from that character.
flavor: "Wars do not win themselves, Tyrion." -Lady Cersei Lannister

name: Queen Daenerys's Command
text: House Targaryen only. Dominance: kneel your House card to search your deck for a [targaryen] attachment, reveal it to all players, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
flavor: "One hundred and sixty-three..." -Lady Daenerys Targaryen

name: Straw Men
text: Deathbound. Challenges: during [military] challenges this phase, all characters lose deadly, and lower the printed claim value on each player's revealed plot card to zero. [doomed]
flavor: Men in black cloaks were visible on the other roof or tower tops as well, though nine of every ten happened to be made of straw.

name: Take Off Your Collars!
text: Challenges: put into play a [targaryen] character with printed cost 2 or lower from your hand. Then, if Daenerys Targaryen is in your dead pile, put her into play.

name: The Crow is a Tricksy Bird
text: Response: save a Night's Watch character from being killed. Then, if there are more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters in play, stand that character. Until the end of the phase, it gets +2 STR and gains a [military], an [intrigue] and a [power] icon.

name: The Others Take Your Honor!
text: Response: after you win a challenge in which at least 1 [baratheon] character participated, move any number of power from one of your characters to your House card. Then, if Robert Baratheon is in your dead pile, put him into play.

name: The Pack Survives
text: Response: cancel a triggered effect that chooses 1 or more [stark] defending characters as a target. Then, if Eddard Stark is in your dead pile, put him into play.

name: The Watch Has Need!
text: Any phase: kneel 2 influence to put the top 2 cards of your deck into play, face down, each as a character named "Recruit." It has the Night's Watch trait, 1 STR, a [military] icon, and the no attachments keyword.
flavor: He turned the letter over, and saw the wax that had sealed it had been black.

name: There Are No Men Like Me
text: Challenges: choose a [lannister] character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains a [military] and an [intrigue] icon. Then, if Ser Jaime Lannister is in your dead pile, put him into play.

name: This is the Season!
text: Response: after you play a [greyjoy] character from your hand, choose and stand a location. Then, if Theon Greyjoy is in your dead pile, put him into play.

name: Twilight Brings Hope
text: Challenges: until the end of the phase, each player who controls more Night's Watch characters than Wildling characters raises the Claim value on their revealed plot card by 1.
flavor: He saw bands of wildlings try to stand and fight, but the attackers rode right over them.

name: Wraiths in the Midst
text: When revealed, each player must choose and discard 2 cards from his or her hand, if able.

name: Defenders of the Realm
text: When revealed, if you have 1 or fewer Kingdom plot cards in your used pile, search your deck for up to 2 non-unique Night's Watch characters, with combined printed cost of 6 or lower, and put them into play. Then shuffle your deck.

name: Wildling Assault
text: When revealed, if you have 1 or fewer Kingdom plot cards in your used pile, search your deck for up to 2 non-unique Wildling characters, with combined printed cost of 6 or lower, and put them into play. Then shuffle your deck.

name: The Wildling Horde
text: You need 5 additional power to win the game. Response: after you play a Wildling character from your hand, discard X power from each opponent's House. X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile (limit once per round.)

name: Threat from the East
text: At the end of the dominance phase, each player must choose and discard all but 4 cards in his or her hand, if able.

name: Defenders of the North
text: You draw 1 fewer card during the draw phase. Response: after you draw cards during the draw phase, reveal the top X cards of your deck and put them into your hand. X is the number of doomed cards in your dead pile.
